sub_title: I help finance & other business professionals communicate confidently and effectively in English | Highly experienced English Language Trainer | International Speaker & Presenter | Professional writer
summary:
Do you want to take your career to the next level? I am an ELT trainer based in the Netherlands with a proven track record of more than 25 years of experience working in the field of business English. 

Grow as a Presenter
Business communication has seen a major shift towards more public speaking in English. Are you lacking confidence as a presenter and wish to upgrade your skills? As an experienced international presenter, I can provide the tutoring and feedback you are looking for. 

I offer a short tailored 1-on-1 course. You will learn how to: 
•	Engage the audience through your story
•	Stay on focus with your message
•	Give a flexible and appropriate response to audience questions
•	Use language confidently and flexibly.

The tailored course is three sessions of one hour with additional activities to support your development. You will also have email feedback and tips for the duration of the course. Your investment is € 360.  

Grow as a Communicator
As a professional you need to be a natural and fluent communicator in a broad and diverse range of business situations. As an experienced specialist in business English, I can provide the tutoring and feedback you are looking for. 

I offer 1-on-1 or group courses where you will learn how to: 
•	Stay on point with your message
•	Be timely and appropriate in your response
•	Show confidence and flexibility in your English
•	Adjust and respond adequately in unexpected situations

The tailored 1-on-1 course has a pre-course assessment and includes ten sessions of one hour with additional activities to support your development. You will also have email feedback and tips for the duration of the course. Your investment is € 999.

The group course has a maximum of 6 participants. It has a pre-course assessment and ten sessions of one hour, with additional group activities and weekly email feedback and tips for the duration of the course. Your investment is € 490.

Interested? Message me here for a free initial consultation.

awards.title: Ereteken van Amsterdam
awards.description: The Ereteken van Amsterdam is an Honorary award which was given by the City of Amsterdam for my work in developing a now flourishing public tennis club PST in Amsterdam. It's currently the only club of this kind in the Amsterdam city centre. I'm especially proud of the award because it reflects two things: my love for the city and the hard work and devotion my fellow members put into helping me build this up.

profile_positions.description:
I am an ELT trainer based in the Netherlands with a proven track record of more than 25 years of experience working in the field of business English. 

In recent years, business communication has seen a major shift towards more and more public speaking, making good presentation skills a must for professionals. As an experienced international presenter, I can provide the tutoring and feedback you need to become more effective in your presentations. Learn how to:

· Engage the audience through your story
· Stay on focus with your message
· Give a flexible and appropriate response to audience questions
· Improvise in response to unexpected questions
· Use language confidently and flexibly.
profile_positions.title: ELT Trainer

profile_positions.description: I specialise in translation and editorial work for the art industry, which includes collaboration with Dutch art museums and contemporary (Dutch) artists. Also: in the ELT sector I headed until 2020 the IATEFL BESIG Editorial team, and was overall responsible for the production of its digital conference series.
profile_positions.title: Editor and Translator

profile_positions.description: I regularly publish about ELT topics which include Business English and related educational areas. An important feature of my writing is collaboration with business clients on improving or creating relevant content. In the latter role I've written a series of articles on the art industry and wealth management.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Writer

profile_positions.description: In recent years I have gradually become more involved in teacher training, for example through workshops or online moderating / tutoring. I have given workshops to Dutch schools and colleges on new practices for teaching grammar and speaking.
profile_positions.title: Teacher Trainer

profile_positions.description:
I have given CPD talks and workshops throughout the UK, Netherlands, and Germany. Other international venues include Athens, Budapest, Dubrovnik, Graz, Moscow, Paris, Portland (Oregon) and Prague. Currently these CPD events are online. Workshops subjects include: creativity and innovative learning, applied improvisation, reflective practice and teacher / learner motivation. 

Recent Workshops:

IATEFL BESIG Annual Conference
Online event, November 2020  

TESOL France Annual Colloquium
Online event, November 2020 

Trendy English Summit
Online event, May 2020

Winter School (key speaker)
Plekhanov University of Economics, Moscow
20-24 January 2020
profile_positions.title: International Speaker / Presenter

profile_positions.description: My recent work as a Business English trainer for Language Partners covered a wide range of programmes with a key focus on the financial services sector, which is one of my specialities. Blended learning is an integral component of most programmes, which I also advise on. As a teacher trainer I have also given workshops for the Language Partners Academy.
profile_positions.title: Business English Trainer

profile_positions.description: My specialties while working at Interlingua covered a broad spectrum. They include Business English for financial services, human resources, and advisory. I also train presentation skills, professional and academic writing, and cross-cultural communication as an integrated part of Business English programmes.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business English & Intercultural communication Trainer

profile_positions.description: I was a member of the IATEFL Publications Committee, which oversees all publications of our professional network. During my tenure I had the overall responsibility for the monthly eBulletin of this global network for ELT professionals.
profile_positions.title: Member IATEFL Publications Committee

skills: Teaching English as a Second Language
